LOCALS_DEF.item: *"* use this source file for any type of declarations (class
*"* definitions, interfaces or type declarations) you need for

LOCALS_IMP.item: *"* use this source file for the definition and implementation of
*"* local helper classes, interface definitions and type

LOCALS_MAC.item: *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need
*"* in the implementation part of the class

GET_CAD_MEC_BOM_STATUS.item: * Estrazione del primo carattere valido per il change number del CAD Meccanico
FROM ztpp000 INNER JOIN t419s ON t419s~aenst = ztpp000~zzds2
RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zcx_bc_exception MESSAGE s018(zppp_ectr).

GET_BOM_MEC_ROOTNAME.item: LOOP AT lt_allocvalueschar INTO DATA(ls_allocvalueschar) WHERE charact = 'ZPS_WBS_APERTE'.
SPLIT ls_allocvalueschar-value_char AT '&' INTO ls_rootname-posid ls_rootname-rootname.
SELECT SINGLE * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF ls_wbs_aperte FROM zps_wbs_aperte WHERE zwbsroot LIKE lv_wbsroot.
DATA: lt_split TYPE TABLE OF string.
SPLIT ls_wbs_aperte-zwbsroot AT ' & ' INTO TABLE lt_split.
SELECT SINGLE dispo INTO <ls_rootname>-dispo FROM marc WHERE matnr = <ls_rootname>-rootname

GET_BOM_SCH_ROOTNAME.item: SELECT mast~matnr INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE lt_matnr_2
FROM stpo INNER JOIN stas ON stas~stlty = stpo~stlty AND
INNER JOIN mast ON mast~werks = space AND

GET_BOM_ROOTNAME.item: IF ( iv_aennr IS INITIAL AND iv_sortf = 'SCHELETRO' ).
SELECT SINGLE * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF ls_wbs_aperte FROM zps_wbs_aperte WHERE zwbsroot LIKE lv_wbsroot.
DATA: lt_split TYPE TABLE OF string.
SPLIT ls_wbs_aperte-zwbsroot AT ' & ' INTO TABLE lt_split.
SELECT SINGLE dispo INTO <ls_rootname>-dispo FROM marc WHERE matnr = <ls_rootname>-rootname

GET_BOM.item: DATA: lt_stb TYPE TABLE OF stpox.
MODIFY rs_bom-t_stb FROM ls_data INDEX lv_index TRANSPORTING baugr.
* Stesso livello di BOM quindi stesso BAUGR
MODIFY rs_bom-t_stb FROM ls_data INDEX lv_index TRANSPORTING baugr.
* Livello di BOM aumentato quindi BAUGR = IDNRK del record precedente
MODIFY rs_bom-t_stb FROM ls_data INDEX lv_index TRANSPORTING baugr.
* Livello di BOM diminuito. Posizionarsi sull'ultimo record di pari livello e quindi avremo lo stesso BAUGR
LOOP AT lt_data_old INTO DATA(ls_data_01) FROM 1 TO ( lv_index - 1 )
MODIFY rs_bom-t_stb FROM ls_data INDEX lv_index TRANSPORTING baugr.
ENDLOOP. "LOOP AT rs_bom-t_stb INTO DATA(ls_data) WHERE stufe = lv_index.

GET_BOM_DATES.item: startdate TYPE string, "campo per sort nella forma AAAAMMGGHHMMSS
enddate TYPE string, "campo per sort nella forma AAAAMMGGHHMMSS
" seleziono i record della zpp_pdm_nor_bom attivi per la tripletta
SORT lt_data BY startdate DESCENDING enddate ASCENDING.
SORT lt_data BY startdate DESCENDING enddate ASCENDING.

GET_ACTIVE_NODES.item: TYPES: startdate TYPE string. "campo per sort nella forma AAAAMMGGHHMMSS
TYPES: enddate TYPE string. "campo per sort nella forma AAAAMMGGHHMMSS
TYPES: ty_t_data TYPE TABLE OF ty_s_data.
* Estrazione di tutti i ROOTNAME in cui il legame √® presente, sappiamo che a partit√† di legame
* Non attivare il seguente filtro perch√® un legame potrebbe essere stato cancellato
LOOP AT lt_data INTO DATA(ls_data_2) WHERE parentname = ls_data-parentname
SORT lt_data_2 BY startdate DESCENDING enddate ASCENDING.
